name: SAR Trailing Stop
short_description: A real classic, to follow the deviation of the Parabolic SAR for trailing management, in fact it is the only indicator that makes sense to use it for this.

params.title: SAR Trailing Stop x.x.x.
params.content: The name, version, and link to find references for this tool

params.title: Min AF
params.content: You can enter the minimum value of the SAR acceleration factor

params.title: Max AF
params.content: You can enter the maximum, value of the SAR acceleration factor

params.title: Auto Stop ?
params.content: You can choose to stop cbot in case there are no more trades in the market
